content.html: I wish I could mute pictures of positive LFTs. I’m still being careful, and I support people continuing to test etc. But as someone with health anxiety, doomscrolling really wrecked my mental health last year - and I wish it was possible to opt out of constant reminders.
content.value:
I wish I could mute pictures of positive LFTs.

I’m still being careful, and I support people continuing to test etc. But as someone with health anxiety, doomscrolling really wrecked my mental health last year - and I wish it was possible to opt out of constant reminders.
